docs.snippet: THE sixth season of the Ravinia Festival at Ravinia Park, near Chicago, will open July 1 and continue for six weeks. Sir Thomas Beecham will conduct the Chicago Symphony Orchestra during the opening fortnight.
docs.lead_paragraph: THE sixth season of the Ravinia Festival at Ravinia Park, near Chicago, will open July 1 and continue for six weeks. Sir Thomas Beecham will conduct the Chicago Symphony Orchestra during the opening fortnight.

headline.main: ACTIVITIES OF MUSICIANS HERE AND AFIELD; Sit Thomas Beecham to Direct First Two Weeks of Ravinia Concerts

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Feb. 15 -- How the countries of Latin America increased their buying from the United States 50 per cent in the first year of the war to replace European supply sources, but have found exchange controls, financial aid from the United...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Feb. 15 -- How the countries of Latin America increased their buying from the United States 50 per cent in the first year of the war to replace European supply sources, but have found exchange controls, financial aid from the United States, marketing agreements and promotion of inter-Latin American trade an inadequate substitute for European markets is described in a review by the Department of Commerce in the current issue of Foreign Commerce Weekly.
docs.abstract: U S Commerce Dept revs Latin Amer increased buying from U S; exch controls, financial aid and trade pacts found poor substitute for Eur markets

headline.main: Exports to Latin America Up 50%; Taking Place of European Supply; Countries, However, Find Exchange Controls, Financial Aid and Trade Agreements Poor Substitute for Markets on Continent EXPORTS RISE 50% TO LATIN AMERICA

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Feb. 15 -- The United States has supplied to the British more than 755,000 tons of cargo ships since Oct. 26, 1939. Of this total 694,617 tons was transferred to British registry and 60,985 tons to Canadian registry.

docs.snippet: LA PAZ, Bolivia, Feb. 16 -- Bolivia will never forsake the principle of free unrestricted transit, which is complementary to her sovereignty, said Forein Minister Alberto Ostria Gutierrez in an interview today, commenting on the outcome of the recent...
docs.lead_paragraph: LA PAZ, Bolivia, Feb. 16 -- Bolivia will never forsake the principle of free unrestricted transit, which is complementary to her sovereignty, said Forein Minister Alberto Ostria Gutierrez in an interview today, commenting on the outcome of the recent River Plate conference.

docs.snippet: Seven officers of the Brazilian Army arrived here yesterday on the American Republics liner Uruguay to attend classes at the Army War College at Washington. The Uruguay arrived from Buenos Aires via Montevideo, Rio de Janeiro and Trinidad with 278...
docs.lead_paragraph: Seven officers of the Brazilian Army arrived here yesterday on the American Republics liner Uruguay to attend classes at the Army War College at Washington. The Uruguay arrived from Buenos Aires via Montevideo, Rio de Janeiro and Trinidad with 278 passengers and a 6,169-ton cargo, including the first 1941 consignment of fruit from Argentina.
